description:
Very good app. I would love to see more themes in it.
Best Facebook messenger app in Linux. Highly Recommended
The only 2 features I'd like to see that don't seem to be present: a spell check feature & some sort of notification of incoming messages. Otherwise exactly what I was looking for.
summary: Simple with a functional interface. Useful and easy

description: If we could have notifications would be a 5/5.
I used it in Ubuntu 19.04, 19.10 and it works perfectly, but not in Fedora 32, and Im using Fedora now :(

if there was a way to hide the right panel so it could be resized into a smaller squre I believe i'll use it more frequently but it's just too big with the right panel always showing the user's profile.. if it could be more like the actual messenger in windows 10 app then it'd be a great feature.
summary: it's ok, but needs more work

description:
il faut mettre a jour cette application au plus vite, déjà elle n'est pas attaché a la barre d'état, donc si on appuie sur la crois rouge par hazard c'est bon, il faut se reconnecter de nouveau, de plus à part le signale sonore, il n y’a pas la petit notification rouge pour réception de nouveaux message.
Franchement, je conseille de la mettre à jour au plus vite car elle n'a rien à avoir pour le moment avec Caprine pour ubuntu ou le même messenger fb pour Windows :(
